title: Get the most out of your Mac with lifetime access to a trio of media organizers
content:
Consumers around the world consistently turn to Apple for their products’ sleek, modern design and reliably high performance. However, constant changes in technology can sometimes make using devices to consume things like media difficult (think watching a DVD in the streaming era). Thankfully, this high-powered software trio makes managing your media a breeze. 

The MacX Media Management Bundle includes three separate programs that allow users to manage files like never before. And right now, and for a limited time, lifetime access to all three programs is available for only $39.99. The combined value of all three programs is $689 (that’s a savings of 94%).

The bundle includes MacX Video Converter Pro which allows you to watch any video without worrying about compatibility. MacX media Trans safely transfers most types of files across all devices. And MacX DVD Ripper converts DVDs to digital copies that can be watched across devices. 

Users love the MacX software for its intuitiveness and facility. “MacX DVD Ripper Pro ranks No.1 fast DVD ripper for Mac compared to similar products in the market.”

Start managing your files like never before with the MacX Media Bundle. 

Prices subject to change.
